document_data.name: Adarl Summerstar
document_data.Personality: Adarl Summerstar was a quiet man.
document_data.Description: His old age was most salient about him.
document_data.Relationships: He was the head of House [[Summerstar]].
document_data.History: During the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Adarl Summerstar was among those nobles who called out to their peers to sit back down just as the situation degenerated into violence.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|93|10}}
document_data.Reputation: Among the comments of the crowd as he entered [[Castle Obarskyr]], the general sentiment appeared to be that he was "a proper gentlesir".
